trans-unit.source: Represents the default version of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowLoaderService"></xref> created by the workflow runtime engine if no other workflow loader service is added.
trans-unit.target: Representa a versão padrão do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowLoaderService"> </xref> criado pelo mecanismo de tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho, se nenhum outro serviço de carregador de fluxo de trabalho é adicionado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> class creates a DefaultWorkflowLoaderService object when the runtime engine is started, if no other workflow loader service derived from <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowLoaderService> has been added as a service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>classe cria um objeto DefaultWorkflowLoaderService quando o mecanismo de tempo de execução é iniciado, se nenhum outro serviço de carregador de fluxo de trabalho derivado de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowLoaderService>foi adicionado como um serviço.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowLoaderService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowLoaderService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowLoaderService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a root activity definition tree by using the specified workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma árvore de definição de atividade raiz usando o fluxo de trabalho especificado <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the workflow to create.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do fluxo de trabalho para criar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> object that represents the root activity definition tree.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> objeto que representa a árvore de definição de atividade raiz.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new root activity definition tree by deserializing the .xoml and the .rules files.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova árvore de definição de atividade raiz desserializando o xoml e os arquivos. rules.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that holds the workflow XOML definition (.xoml file).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>que contém a definição XOML do fluxo de trabalho (arquivo. xoml).</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that holds the workflow rules (.rules file).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>que contém as regras de fluxo de trabalho (arquivo. Rules).</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> object that represents the root activity definition tree.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> objeto que representa a árvore de definição de atividade raiz.
